title: Ocenia all wants this
body: can we please get unchained alistair skin for free??? its not fair as NA gets it free but not oce, we get just riot girl trist and dreadnight garen. Pretty please Riot???{{champion:12}} {{champion:12}} {{champion:12}}

replies.body: we can get it for free though

Yeah, you can get it for free, same with the garen skin, just look it up on YouTube... I've got all 3 free skins

Riot girl tristana 
Unchained Alistar
Dread knight garen

Hey Saphixia,

If you are having trouble redeeming the Unchained Alistair skin head on over to [player support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and they can get that sorted out for you.
